body:
So...I read it. (Thank you Greg and Stephen.) And...it pointed me to an 
earlier report. Does anyone have a copy of Grynberg's "Comparison and 
Validation of Radiance and Superlite?" Or is that another one of these 
things to be found only in Greg's closet?


Randolph
